slide.title: Save bandwidth with Tidy

blurb.title: You can save considerable bandwidth with tidy as well

slide.blurb: Consider the following ran against a copy of the php.net home page:

blurb.title: After tidy is finished, compare the file sizes..

slide.example:
-rw-rw-r--    1 john     john        27066 Jan  3 04:11 php.html
-rw-rw-r--    1 john     john        26193 Jan  3 04:11 php_tidy.html

blurb.title: Without losing maintainability, tidy has saved 873 bytes per request

slide.blurb: That might not seem like a lot, but when you serve 100,000 hits a day you save *87.3 megabytes a day* in bandwidth.
